Comments: Hail of dime to quarter coin size reported around 3 miles south of La Belle on SR 29. (MFL)
Reported by Weather Spotter. Time estimated by radar. (GYX)
Public report of accumulating dime size hail along Interstate 80. Hail about 1 to 3 inches deep in some areas. A few estimated ping pong ball sized hailstones mixed in (CYS)
KAKE storm spotter reported a few quarter size hail stones in south part of Arkansas City. (ICT)
